mapper.select: select getNextVal(#{_parameter}) from dual

select merch_id,merch_name,plat_id, legal_person,status,payment_type, global_type,global_id,tel_no, email,address,url,create_date, create_user,update_date,update_user, cancel_date,cancel_user,effect_date, source_type,remark,merch_type, merch_level,allow_user,allow_date,allow_status from va_merch_info
and status = #{status} and merch_id = #{merch_id} and tel_no = #{tel_no}

select plat_id,pay_merch_id,plat_name, legal_person,status,payment_type, global_type,global_id,tel_no, email,address,url,create_date, create_user,update_date,update_user, cancel_date,cancel_user,effect_date, source_type,remark,plat_type, plat_level,allow_user,allow_date,allow_status from va_plat_info
and status = #{status} and plat_id = #{plat_id} and pay_merch_id = #{pay_merch_id}

select vir_acct_id,merch_id,plat_id, vir_acct_type,vir_acct_sort, vir_acct_name,currency, acct_status,acct_no, is_in,is_out,is_total_limit, total_limit,is_balance_limit, balance_type,balance_value, open_date,open_user, cancel_date,update_date, source_user,effect_date,merch_name from va_merch_virtual_acct
and acct_status = #{acct_status} and plat_id = #{plat_id} and merch_id = #{merch_id}

select vir_acct_id,cust_id,plat_id, vir_acct_type,vir_acct_sort, vir_acct_name,user_id,currency, acct_status,acct_no, is_in,is_out,is_total_limit, total_limit,is_balance_limit, balance_type,balance_value, open_date,open_user, cancel_date,update_date, source_user,effect_date,cust_name from va_cust_virtual_acct
and acct_status = #{acct_status} and plat_id = #{plat_id} and cust_id = #{cust_id}
select run_date,prev_run_date,core_run_date,ser_status_flag from cm_system
select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_name like 'va_%' union all select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_name like 'cm_%'
select tran_type cache_key1,para_key cache_key2,para_value from cm_business_para where para_status='1'
select count(1) from va_order_info where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_order_seq where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_transfer_seq where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_cust_recharge_seq where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_merch_recharge_seq where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_cust_withdraw_seq where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(1) from va_merch_withdraw_seq where order_no = #{order_no}

select inner_oder_no,order_no,plat_id,plat_virid,payer_id,payer_virid,payee_id, payee_virid,pay_type,tran_amt,usable_bal,recharge_bal,tran_type,order_status,date_format(create_date, '%Y%m%d') from va_order_info where order_no = #{order_no_old}
